description.narrative: The development objective of the projet is to strengthen the delivery of urban services at the municipal level with special emphasis on Ouagadougou, Bobo-Dioulasso, Koudougou, Banfora, Ouahigouya and Kaya.

condition.narrative: Adoption of the financial code of the Local Government Permanent Development Fund
Allocation proposed in the budget law for financing PIP furnished by September 30 of each year
Recipient ensure that the LGPDF provides funds to finance PIP of municipal contracts
